title: Honey and mustard chicken
description: Chicken breast fillets marinated in honey, Dijon mustard, olive oil and balsamic vinegar, served with pasta and sun-dried tomatoes.
methods: Combine the honey, mustard, olive oil and balsamic vinegar in a bowl, mixing until smooth.
Coat the chicken breast fillets with the marinade, and leave in the fridge for 30 minutes or more.
Heat some oil in a large pan or wok. Add the chicken and marinade to the pan and cook until the chicken is golden brown.
In the meantime, cook the pasta according to the packet instructions. With 2 minutes to go, add the sun-dried tomatoes to the chicken.
When the pasta is cooked, drain and stir into the chicken. Serve with a salad.
